Name: &aGarden Trouble
Description: Help Maggie, the Fallen Kingdom Herbalist, rebuild her garden after a recent raid.
Author: TangleFire360

Dialog.&5&l[name]: Oh sorry, but I’m out of-
Wait a second, you’re not here for any medicine?
You're here to help me with my garden?
That’s fantastic! I could really use the help.
Believe it or not, the biggest part of my garden that got destroyed was the part with my potatoes in it.
Do you mind bringing me &c&l64 potatoes&f?
I see you’ve gotten some potatoes, but I needed &c&l64 Potatoes&f.
Um, did you bring any potatoes? I don’t see any...
I asked for &c&l64 Potatoes&f.
Ah, thank you!
While you were out, I was looking through my stores of medicine and noticed that all the sugar was gone
I use it to help make some of my medicines a little more pleasant for children, or they wouldn’t take them like they should.
Normally I grow some sugarcane in my garden...but it’s still quite messy right now.
If you could get me &c&l96 Sugarcane&f I can start to replenish my supply.
So uh….this isn’t enough.
I need enough to plant &oand&r make sugar from.
Surely you can find &c&l96 Sugarcane&f?
Good job, this is plenty for both sugar and a start to a new sugarcane patch in the garden.
Say, you’ve helped me out a lot, but can I ask for one more favor?
I use the juice of sweet berries for some of my concoctions as well.
My berry bushes are still intact, but I’ve used all my berries for medicine.
Get me &c&l128 Sweet Berries&f and then I should be all caught up!
Well, this is kinda close...
However this won’t be enough to completely restock.
I needed &c&l128 Sweet Berry&f to finish up.
Huh, well I guess I asked for something too hard for you to get.
You can get sweet berries from Billy if you have &c&lFarm Level 3&f.
Remember, I need &c&l128 Sweet Berries&f to get things back in order!
You got them!
This will be plenty, and I won’t have to worry about it for a while thanks to you.
Thank you for all your help, we’re lucky to have you around!
Well, I'll remember to ask for you if I need help again sometime.
Oh, and before I forget, can you hold on to this really for now?
It keeps getting in my way sitting around here, but I don't have time to return it right now.

SendMessage: &5&l[name]&f Why do I have an axe laying around my shop? Well, my little brother came to trim a tree for me and left it behind by accident.
